short_summary: acquisition for boxes of personal effects that are provided to all establishments in the Quebec region used for the transfer of inmates as well as boxes of packaging for the needs of the operations of the national depot
description: The aim of this procurement is to acquire industrial parts washing machines.

full_summary:
## W0106-22J018 Industrial Parts Washing Machine
### Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** WS3856691022-Doc3856915849
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3856691022
* **Publication Date:** February 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 7, 2023 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
  * **Name:** Stephane Dube (SPAC/PSPC)
  * **Email:** stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for standing offer for the acquisition of boxes of personal effects for inmates and packaging for the national depot, as detailed in Annex A. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2 PM EST on March 7, 2023. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. The solicitation number is WS3856691022, and the tender closing date is March 7, 2023.

### Additional Information
* **UNSPSC:** 23281900 (Metal cleaning machinery and supplies)
* **Contracting Entity Name (French):** Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entities Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Notice URL
* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15316312?extsite=MTUzMTYzMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15316312?extsite=MTUzMT
